name: Taktical Solutions
overview:
Taktical Solutions is a New York based digital marketing firm.

The firm uses multiple channels of marketing in a cohesive manner in order to deliver results to clients.

The firm, which differentiates itself from typical digital marketing firms by positioning itself as a company that builds online brands, uses social networking, social media, search engine marketing, mobile marketing, and reputation management together in concert as a single system. Although services are offered a ‘la carte, the firm often strongly encourages clients to consider the other services in order to aid efforts.

The firm’s CEO, Ilan Nass, argues that singular services (such as networking via Facebook) are ineffectual in building brand images online. With 97% of consumers researching online before making a purchase decision, Taktical attempts to achieve a full spectrum of image building services under one roof.

Taktical’s client list is mostly confidential, although several national brands are rumored to be paying customers. Clients of Taktical regularly see increases in Facebook and Twitter followers in the thousands per month. They are one of the only firms in the world capable of guaranteeing increases such as these.
